original: 東漢末年，黃巾起事，已瀕臨幽州邊界，幽州太守出榜召募義軍，榜文張貼於涿縣時，只見一人望著榜文興嘆。
text: At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the Yellow Turban was on the verge of the border of Youzhou. The prefect of Youzhou came out of the list to recruit rebels. When the list was posted in Zhuo County, only one person looked at the list and sighed.
